title: Bug report
body:
Hi, I have to report a bug, when I was playing talon and had Deathfire Torch in my mastery, my Q didn't apply its damage over time effect. However, when playing with fizz or brand, it does apply(Fizz W, Brand passive).
Since they are all damage over time, Deathfire Torch should apply to talon's Q ability too.

replies.body: Talon's Q doesn't apply spell effects, according to Leagueoflegends.wikia.com.
It's deathfire touch, also you're in the wrong forums.
